thread.title: Fugitive hiker pleads guilty to fraud in $8.7 million embezzling case

title: Fugitive hiker pleads guilty to fraud in $8.7 million embezzling case
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun News - Today 
A Kentucky accountant who spent much of six years as a fugitive hiking the Appalachian Trail pleaded guilty Friday to a wire fraud count and...
